abstract: After pushing the envelope in accounting and corporate governance, Groupon and Zynga have shown the value of standards enforced by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
snippet: After pushing the envelope in accounting and corporate governance, Groupon and Zynga have shown the value of standards enforced by the Securities and Exchange Commission.

headline.main: Grouponomics and Zyngametrics, but Few Sound Numbers
headline.print_headline: Grouponomics and Zyngametrics, but Few Sound Numbers
